title: Just buy the book
description: I’m frugal (we’ll put it nicely) and in the past didn’t value owning books, but I’m changing my tune. I’m finding it a more rewarding experience, generally, to read nonfiction books on paper than my Kindle, despite the many advantages of reading on a screen (backlighting, night mode, comfort in hand, exportable notes, enlargeable type […]

title: When life is an externality
description: The Capitalists Will Let You Drown by J.P. Hill New York is in many ways a microcosm of the greater problem that can be seen across this country and across the world, that of our politicians funding violence but not care, police but not our basic needs. And there are multiple reasons for these priorities, […]
